 2222:     true = erlang:purge_module(nif_mod),
 2223: 
 2224:     true = lists:member(?MODULE, erlang:system_info(taints)),
 2225:     true = lists:member(nif_mod, erlang:system_info(taints)),
 2226:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),    
 2227:     ok.
 2228: 
 2229: make_resource(Type,Holder,Str) when is_list(Str) ->
 2230:     Bin = list_to_binary(Str),
 2231:     A1 = make_resource_do(Type,Holder,Bin),
 2232:     Bin = read_resource(Type,A1),
 2233:     {A1,Bin}.
 2234: 
 2235: make_resource_do(Type, Holder, Bin) ->
 2236:     Holder ! {self(), make, Type, Bin},
 2237:     {Holder, make_ok, Id} = receive_any(),
 2238:     {Holder,Id}.
 2239: 
 2240: read_resource(Type, {Holder,Id}) ->
 2241:     Holder ! {self(), get, Type, Id},
 2242:     {Holder, get_ok, Bin} = receive_any(),
 2243:     Bin.
 2244: 
 2245: forget_resource({Holder,Id}) ->
 2246:     Holder ! {self(), forget, Id},
 2247:     {Holder, forget_ok, Id} = receive_any(),
 2248:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, aux_work),
 2249:     ok.
 2250: 
 2251: 
 2252: resource_holder() ->
 2253:     resource_holder([]).
 2254: resource_holder(List) ->
 2255:     %%io:format("resource_holder waiting for msg\n", []),
 2256:     Msg = receive_any(),
 2257:     %%io:format("resource_holder got ~p with list = ~p\n", [Msg,List]),
 2258:     case Msg of
 2259: 	{Pid, make, Type, Bin} ->	    
 2260: 	    Resource = nif_mod:make_new_resource(Type, Bin),
 2261: 	    Id = {make_ref(),Bin},
 2262: 	    Pid ! {self(), make_ok, Id},
 2263: 	    resource_holder([{Id,Resource} | List]);
 2264: 	{Pid, get, Type, Id} ->
 2265: 	    {Id,Resource} = lists:keyfind(Id, 1, List),
 2266: 	    Pid ! {self(), get_ok, nif_mod:get_resource(Type, Resource)},
 2267: 	    resource_holder(List);
 2268: 	
 2269: 	{Pid, forget, Id} ->
 2270: 	    NewList = lists:keydelete(Id, 1, List),
 2271: 	    %%io:format("resource_holder forget: NewList = ~p\n", [NewList]),
 2272: 	    resource_holder(Pid, {self(),forget_ok,Id}, NewList)
 2273:     end.
 2274: 
 2275: resource_holder(Pid,Reply,List) ->
 2276:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 2277:     %%io:format("resource_holder GC'ed, now send ~p to ~p\n", [Reply,Pid]),
 2278:     Pid ! Reply,
 2279:     resource_holder(List).
 2280: 
 2281: 
 2282: %% Test the threading API functions (reuse tests from driver API)
 2283: threading(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2284:     case erlang:system_info(threads) of
 2285:     	true -> threading_do(Config);
 2286: 	false -> {skipped,"No thread support"}
 2287:     end.
 2288: 
 2289: threading_do(Config) ->
 2290:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2291:     File = filename:join(Data, "tester"),
 2292:     {ok,tester,ModBin} = compile:file(File, [binary,return_errors]),
 2293:     {module,tester} = erlang:load_module(tester,ModBin),
 2294: 
 2295:     ok = tester:load_nif_lib(Config, "basic"),   
 2296:     ok = tester:run(),
 2297: 
 2298:     erlang:load_module(tester,ModBin),
 2299:     erlang:purge_module(tester),
 2300:     ok = tester:load_nif_lib(Config, "rwlock"),
 2301:     ok = tester:run(),
 2302: 
 2303:     erlang:load_module(tester,ModBin),
 2304:     erlang:purge_module(tester),
 2305:     ok = tester:load_nif_lib(Config, "tsd"),
 2306:     ok = tester:run(),
 2307: 
 2308:     erlang:delete_module(tester),
 2309:     erlang:purge_module(tester).
 2310: 
 2311: 
 2312: %% Test NIF message sending
 2313: send(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
 2314:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2315: 
 2316:     N = 1500,
 2317:     List = lists:seq(1,N),
 2318:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self),
 2319:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2320:     List = receive_any(),
 2321:     List = receive_any(),
 2322:     Papa = self(),
 2323:     spawn_link(fun() -> {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, Papa) end),
 2324:     List = receive_any(),
 2325: 
 2326:     {ok, 1, BlobS} = send_new_blob(self(), other_term()),
 2327:     BlobR = receive_any(),
 2328:     io:format("Sent ~p\nGot ~p\n", [BlobS, BlobR]),
 2329:     BlobR = BlobS,
 2330: 
 2331:     %% send to dead pid
 2332:     {DeadPid, DeadMon} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> void end),
 2333:     {'DOWN', DeadMon, process, DeadPid, normal} = receive_any(),
 2334:     {ok,0} = send_list_seq(7, DeadPid),
 2335:     ok.
 2336: 
 2337: 
 2338: %% Test tracing of enif_send
 2339: send_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2340:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2341: 
 2342:     Papa = self(),
 2343:     N = 1500,
 2344:     List = lists:seq(1,N),
 2345: 
 2346:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun F() -> receive get -> Papa ! receive_any(), F() end end),
 2347: 
 2348:     erlang:trace(self(), true, [send,'receive',{tracer,Tracer}]),
 2349:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2350:     List = receive_any(),
 2351:     timeout = receive_any(0),
 2352:     Tracer ! get,
 2353:     {trace,Papa,send,List,Papa} = receive_any(),
 2354:     Tracer ! get,
 2355:     {trace,Papa,'receive',List} = receive_any().
 2356: 
 2357: %% Test that seq_trace works with nif trace
 2358: send_seq_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2359:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2360: 
 2361:     Papa = self(),
 2362:     N = 1500,
 2363:     List = lists:seq(1,N),
 2364:     Label = make_ref(),
 2365: 
 2366:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun F() -> receive get -> Papa ! receive_any(), F() end end),
 2367: 
 2368:     seq_trace:set_system_tracer(Tracer),
 2369:     seq_trace:set_token(label,Label),
 2370:     seq_trace:set_token(send,true),
 2371:     seq_trace:set_token('receive',true),
 2372: 
 2373:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2374:     List = receive_any(),
 2375:     timeout = receive_any(0),
 2376:     {ok,1} = send_list_seq(N, self()),
 2377:     List = receive_any(),
 2378:     timeout = receive_any(0),
 2379: 
 2380:     Tracer ! get,
 2381:     {seq_trace,Label,{send,{0,1},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any(),
 2382:     Tracer ! get,
 2383:     {seq_trace,Label,{'receive',{0,1},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any(),
 2384:     Tracer ! get,
 2385:     {seq_trace,Label,{send,{1,2},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any(),
 2386:     Tracer ! get,
 2387:     {seq_trace,Label,{'receive',{1,2},Papa,Papa,List}} = receive_any().
 2388: 
 2389: 
 2390: %% More NIF message sending
 2391: send2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2392:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2393: 
 2394:     send2_do1(fun send_blob_dbg/2),
 2395:     ok.
 2396: 
 2397: %% Send msg from user thread
 2398: send_threaded(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2399:     send2_do1(fun(ME,To) -> send_blob_thread_dbg(ME,To,join) end),
 2400:     send2_do1(fun(ME,To) -> send_blob_thread_and_join(ME,To) end),
 2401:     ok.
 2402: 
 2403: 
 2404: send2_do1(SendBlobF) ->
 2405:     io:format("sending to self=~p\n",[self()]),
 2406:     send2_do2(SendBlobF, self()),
 2407: 
 2408:     Papa = self(),
 2409:     {Forwarder,_} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> forwarder(Papa) end),
 2410:     io:format("sending to forwarder pid=~p\n",[Forwarder]),
 2411:     send2_do2(SendBlobF, Forwarder),
 2412:     Forwarder ! terminate,
 2413:     {'DOWN', _, process, Forwarder, 4} = receive_any(),
 2414:     ok.
 2415: 
 2416: send2_do2(SendBlobF, To) ->   
 2417:     MsgEnv = alloc_msgenv(),
 2418:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2419:     {ok,1,Blob0} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2420:     Blob1 = receive_any(),
 2421:     Blob1 = Blob0,
 2422:     
 2423:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2424:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2425:     {ok,1,Blob2} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2426:     Blob3 = receive_any(),
 2427:     Blob3 = Blob2,
 2428: 
 2429:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2430:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2431: 
 2432:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2433:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2434:     {ok,1,Blob4} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2435:     Blob5 = receive_any(),
 2436:     Blob5 = Blob4,
 2437: 
 2438:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2439:     clear_msgenv(MsgEnv),
 2440:     repeat(50, fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term()) end, []),
 2441:     {ok,1,Blob6} = SendBlobF(MsgEnv, To),
 2442:     Blob7 = receive_any(),
 2443:     Blob7 = Blob6,
 2444: 
 2445:     ok.
 2446: 
 2447: 
 2448: send_blob_thread_and_join(MsgEnv, To) ->
 2449:     {ok,Blob} = send_blob_thread_dbg(MsgEnv, To, no_join),
 2450:     {ok,SendRes} = join_send_thread(MsgEnv),
 2451:     {ok,SendRes,Blob}.
 2452: 
 2453: send_blob_dbg(MsgEnv, To) ->
 2454:     Ret = send_blob(MsgEnv, To),
 2455:     %%io:format("send_blob to ~p returned ~p\n",[To,Ret]),
 2456:     Ret.
 2457: 
 2458: send_blob_thread_dbg(MsgEnv, To, Join) ->
 2459:     Ret = send_blob_thread(MsgEnv, To, Join),
 2460:     %%io:format("send_blob_thread to ~p Join=~p returned ~p\n",[To,Join,Ret]),
 2461:     Ret.
 2462: 
 2463: 
 2464: forwarder(To) ->
 2465:     forwarder(To, 0).
 2466: forwarder(To, N) ->
 2467:     case receive_any() of
 2468: 	terminate ->
 2469:             gc_and_exit(N);
 2470: 	Msg ->	    
 2471: 	    To ! Msg,	   
 2472: 	    forwarder(To, N+1)
 2473:     end.
 2474: 
 2475: other_term() ->
 2476:     {fun(X,Y) -> X*Y end, make_ref()}.
 2477: 
 2478: %% Message sending stress test
 2479: send3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2480:     %% Let a number of processes send random message blobs between each other
 2481:     %% using enif_send. Kill and spawn new ones randomly to keep a ~constant
 2482:     %% number of workers running.
 2483:     rand:seed(exsplus),
 2484:     io:format("seed: ~p\n",[rand:export_seed()]),
 2485:     ets:new(nif_SUITE,[named_table,public]),
 2486:     true = ets:insert(nif_SUITE,{send3,0,0,0,0}),
 2487:     timer:send_after(10000, timeout), % Run for 10 seconds
 2488:     SpawnCnt = send3_controller(0, [], [], 20),
 2489:     [{_,Rcv,SndOk,SndFail,Balance}] = ets:lookup(nif_SUITE,send3),
 2490:     io:format("spawns=~p received=~p, sent=~p send-failure=~p balance=~p\n",
 2491:               [SpawnCnt,Rcv,SndOk,SndFail,Balance]),
 2492:     ets:delete(nif_SUITE).
 2493: 
 2494: send3_controller(SpawnCnt, [], _, infinity) ->
 2495:     SpawnCnt;
 2496: send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons0, Pids0, Tick) ->
 2497:     receive 
 2498:         timeout ->
 2499:             io:format("Timeout. Sending 'halt' to ~p\n",[Pids0]),            
 2500:             lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! {halt,self()} end, Pids0),
 2501:             lists:foreach(fun(P) -> receive {halted,P} -> ok end end, Pids0),
 2502:             QTot = lists:foldl(fun(P,QSum) ->
 2503:                                  {message_queue_len,QLen} = 
 2504:                                     erlang:process_info(P,message_queue_len),
 2505:                                  QSum + QLen
 2506:                                end, 0, Pids0),
 2507:             io:format("Total queue length ~p\n",[QTot]),            
 2508:             lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! die end, Pids0),
 2509:             send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons0, [], infinity);
 2510:         {'DOWN', MonRef, process, _Pid, _} ->
 2511:             Mons1 = lists:delete(MonRef, Mons0),
 2512:             %%io:format("Got DOWN from ~p. Monitors left: ~p\n",[Pid,Mons1]),            
 2513:             send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons1, Pids0, Tick)
 2514:     after Tick -> 
 2515:         Max = 20,
 2516:         N = length(Pids0),
 2517:         PidN = rand:uniform(Max),
 2518:         %%io:format("N=~p PidN=~p Pids0=~p\n", [N,PidN,Pids0]), 
 2519:         case PidN > N of
 2520:             true ->
 2521:                 {NewPid,Mon} = spawn_opt(fun send3_proc/0, [link,monitor]),                
 2522:                 lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! {is_born,NewPid} end, Pids0),
 2523:                 Balance = ets:lookup_element(nif_SUITE,send3,5),
 2524:                 Inject = (Balance =< 0),
 2525:                 case Inject of
 2526:                     true ->  ok;
 2527:                     false -> ets:update_element(nif_SUITE,send3,{5,-1})
 2528:                 end,
 2529:                 NewPid ! {pids,Pids0,Inject},
 2530:                 send3_controller(SpawnCnt0+1, [Mon|Mons0], [NewPid|Pids0], Tick);
 2531:             false ->
 2532:                 KillPid = lists:nth(PidN,Pids0),
 2533:                 KillPid ! die,
 2534:                 Pids1 = lists:delete(KillPid, Pids0),
 2535:                 lists:foreach(fun(P) -> P ! {is_dead,KillPid} end, Pids1),
 2536:                 send3_controller(SpawnCnt0, Mons0, Pids1, Tick)
 2537:         end        
 2538:    end.
 2539: 
 2540: send3_proc() ->
 2541:     %%io:format("Process ~p spawned\n",[self()]),
 2542:     send3_proc([self()], {0,0,0}, {1,2,3,4,5}).
 2543: send3_proc(Pids0, Counters={Rcv,SndOk,SndFail}, State0) ->
 2544:     %%io:format("~p: Pids0=~p", [self(), Pids0]),
 2545:     %%timer:sleep(10),
 2546:     receive 
 2547:         {pids, Pids1, Inject} ->
 2548:             %%io:format("~p: got ~p Inject=~p\n", [self(), Pids1, Inject]), 
 2549:             Pids0 = [self()],
 2550:             Pids2 = [self() | Pids1],
 2551:             case Inject of
 2552:                 true -> send3_proc_send(Pids2, Counters, State0);
 2553:                 false -> send3_proc(Pids2, Counters, State0)
 2554:             end;
 2555:         {is_born, Pid} ->
 2556:             %%io:format("~p: is_born ~p, got ~p\n", [self(), Pid, Pids0]), 
 2557:             send3_proc([Pid | Pids0], Counters, State0);
 2558:         {is_dead, Pid} ->            
 2559:             Pids1 = lists:delete(Pid,Pids0),
 2560:             %%io:format("~p: is_dead ~p, got ~p\n", [self(), Pid, Pids1]),
 2561:             send3_proc(Pids1, Counters, State0);
 2562:         {blob, Blob0} ->
 2563:             %%io:format("~p: blob ~p\n", [self(), Blob0]),
 2564:             State1 = send3_new_state(State0, Blob0),
 2565:             send3_proc_send(Pids0, {Rcv+1,SndOk,SndFail}, State1);
 2566:         die ->
 2567:             %%io:format("Process ~p terminating, stats = ~p\n",[self(),Counters]),
 2568:             {message_queue_len,Dropped} = erlang:process_info(self(),message_queue_len),
 2569:             _R = ets:update_counter(nif_SUITE,send3,
 2570:                                [{2,Rcv},{3,SndOk},{4,SndFail},{5,1-Dropped}]),
 2571:             %%io:format("~p: dies R=~p\n", [self(), R]),
 2572:             ok;
 2573:         {halt,Papa} ->
 2574:             Papa ! {halted,self()},
 2575:             io:format("~p halted\n",[self()]),
 2576:             receive die -> ok end,
 2577:             io:format("~p dying\n",[self()])
 2578:     end.
 2579: 
 2580: send3_proc_send(Pids, {Rcv,SndOk,SndFail}, State0) ->
 2581:     To = lists:nth(rand:uniform(length(Pids)),Pids),
 2582:     Blob = send3_make_blob(),
 2583:     State1 = send3_new_state(State0,Blob), 
 2584:     case send3_send(To, Blob) of
 2585:         true ->
 2586:             send3_proc(Pids, {Rcv,SndOk+1,SndFail}, State1);
 2587:         false ->
 2588:             send3_proc(Pids, {Rcv,SndOk,SndFail+1}, State1)
 2589:     end.
 2590: 
 2591: 
 2592: send3_make_blob() ->    
 2593:     case rand:uniform(20)-1 of
 2594:         0 -> {term,[]};
 2595:         N ->
 2596:             MsgEnv = alloc_msgenv(), 
 2597:             repeat(N bsr 1,
 2598:                    fun(_) -> grow_blob(MsgEnv,other_term(),rand:uniform(1 bsl 20))
 2599:                    end, void),
 2600:             case (N band 3) of
 2601:                 0 -> {term,copy_blob(MsgEnv)};
 2602:                 1 -> {copy,copy_blob(MsgEnv)};
 2603:                 _ -> {msgenv,MsgEnv}
 2604:             end
 2605:     end.
 2606: 
 2607: send3_send(Pid, Msg) ->
 2608:     %% 90% enif_send and 10% normal bang
 2609:     case rand:uniform(10) of
 2610:         1 -> send3_send_bang(Pid,Msg);
 2611:         _ -> send3_send_nif(Pid,Msg)
 2612:     end.
 2613: send3_send_nif(Pid, {term,Blob}) ->
 2614:     %%io:format("~p send term nif\n",[self()]),
 2615:     send_term(Pid, {blob, Blob}) =:= 1;
 2616: send3_send_nif(Pid, {copy,Blob}) ->
 2617:     %%io:format("~p send term nif\n",[self()]),
 2618:     send_copy_term(Pid, {blob, Blob}) =:= 1;
 2619: send3_send_nif(Pid, {msgenv,MsgEnv}) ->
 2620:     %%io:format("~p send blob nif\n",[self()]),   
 2621:     send3_blob(MsgEnv, Pid, blob) =:= 1.
 2622: 
 2623: send3_send_bang(Pid, {term,Blob}) ->
 2624:     %%io:format("~p send term bang\n",[self()]),   
 2625:     Pid ! {blob, Blob},
 2626:     true;
 2627: send3_send_bang(Pid, {copy,Blob}) ->
 2628:     %%io:format("~p send term bang\n",[self()]),
 2629:     Pid ! {blob, Blob},
 2630:     true;
 2631: send3_send_bang(Pid, {msgenv,MsgEnv}) ->
 2632:     %%io:format("~p send blob bang\n",[self()]),   
 2633:     Pid ! {blob, copy_blob(MsgEnv)},
 2634:     true.
 2635: 
 2636: send3_new_state(State, Blob) ->
 2637:     case rand:uniform(5+2) of
 2638:         N when N =< 5-> setelement(N, State, Blob);
 2639:         _ -> State  % Don't store blob
 2640:     end.
 2641: 
 2642: %% Negative testing of load_nif
 2643: neg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2644:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 2645:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch erlang:load_nif(badarg, 0)),
 2646:     
 2647:     Data = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 2648:     File = filename:join(Data, "nif_mod"),
 2649:     {ok,nif_mod,Bin} = compile:file(File, [binary,return_errors]),
 2650:     {module,nif_mod} = erlang:load_module(nif_mod,Bin),
 2651: 
 2652:     {error,{load_failed,"Failed to load NIF library"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 0),
 2653:     {error,{bad_lib,"Failed to find library init"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 3),
 2654:     {error,{bad_lib,"Function not found"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 4),
 2655:     {error,{bad_lib,"Duplicate NIF entry for"++_}} = nif_mod:load_nif_lib(Config, 5),
 2656:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),
 2657:     ok.
 2658: 
 2659: %% Test all enif_is functions
 2660: is_checks(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2661:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2662:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2663: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2664: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, 12),
 2665:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2666: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2667: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, -12),
 2668:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2669: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2670: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, 18446744073709551617),
 2671:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2672: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2673: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, -18446744073709551617),
 2674:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2675: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2676: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, 99.146),
 2677:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2678: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2679: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, -99.146),
 2680:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2681: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2682: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, 18446744073709551616.2e2),
 2683:     ok = check_is(hejsan, <<19,98>>, make_ref(), ok, fun() -> ok end,
 2684: 			self(), hd(erlang:ports()), [], [1,9,9,8],
 2685: 			{hejsan, "hejsan", [$h,"ejs",<<"an">>]}, -18446744073709551616.2e2),
 2686:     try
 2687:         check_is_exception(),
 2688:         throw(expected_badarg)
 2689:     catch
 2690:         error:badarg ->
 2691:             ok
 2692:     end.
 2693: 
 2694: %% Test all enif_get_length functions
 2695: get_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2696:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2697:     ok = length_test(hejsan, "hejsan", [], [], not_a_list, [1,2|3]).
 2698: 
 2699: ensure_lib_loaded(Config) ->
 2700:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1).
 2701: ensure_lib_loaded(Config, Ver) ->
 2702:     Path = ?config(data_dir, Config),
 2703:     case lib_version() of
 2704:         undefined ->
 2705:             Lib = "nif_SUITE." ++ integer_to_list(Ver),
 2706:             ok = erlang:load_nif(filename:join(Path,Lib), []);
 2707:         Ver when is_integer(Ver) ->
 2708:             ok
 2709:     end,
 2710:     erl_ddll:try_load(Path, echo_drv, []),
 2711:     ok.
 2712: 
 2713: make_atom(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2714:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2715:     An0Atom = an0atom,
 2716:     An0Atom0 = 'an\000atom\000',
 2717:     Atoms = make_atoms(),
 2718:     7 = size(Atoms),
 2719:     Atoms = {An0Atom,An0Atom,An0Atom,An0Atom0,An0Atom,An0Atom,An0Atom0}.
 2720: 
 2721: make_string(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2722:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2723:     Strings = make_strings(),
 2724:     5 = size(Strings),
 2725:     A0String = "a0string",
 2726:     A0String0 = [$a,0,$s,$t,$r,$i,$n,$g,0],
 2727:     AStringWithAccents = [$E,$r,$l,$a,$n,$g,$ ,16#e4,$r,$ ,$e,$t,$t,$ ,$g,$e,$n,$e,$r,$e,$l,$l,$t,$ ,$p,$r,$o,$g,$r,$a,$m,$s,$p,$r,16#e5,$k],
 2728:     Strings = {A0String,A0String,A0String,A0String0, AStringWithAccents}.
 2729: 
 2730: reverse_list_test(Config) ->
 2731:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2732:     List = lists:seq(1,100),
 2733:     RevList = lists:reverse(List),
 2734:     RevList = reverse_list(List),
 2735:     badarg = reverse_list(foo).
 2736: 
 2737: %% Memory leak of tmp-buffer when inspecting iolist or unaligned binary in unbound environment
 2738: otp_9668(Config) ->
 2739:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2740:     TmpMem = tmpmem(),
 2741:     IOList = ["This",' ',<<"is">>,' ',[<<"an iolist">>,'.']],    
 2742:     otp_9668_nif(IOList),
 2743: 
 2744:     <<_:5/bitstring,UnalignedBin:10/binary,_/bitstring>> = <<"Abuse me as unaligned">>,
 2745:     otp_9668_nif(UnalignedBin),
 2746: 
 2747:     verify_tmpmem(TmpMem),
 2748:     ok.
 2749: 
 2750: %% Copy of writable binary
 2751: otp_9828(Config) ->
 2752:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config, 1),
 2753:     otp_9828_loop(<<"I'm alive!">>, 1000).
 2754: 
 2755: otp_9828_loop(_Bin, 0) ->
 2756:     ok;
 2757: otp_9828_loop(Bin, Val) ->
 2758:     WrtBin = <<Bin/binary, Val:32>>,
 2759:     ok = otp_9828_nif(WrtBin),
 2760:     otp_9828_loop(WrtBin, Val-1).
 2761: 
 2762: 
 2763: consume_timeslice(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2764:     case {erlang:system_info(debug_compiled),
 2765: 	  erlang:system_info(lock_checking)} of
 2766: 	{false, false} ->
 2767: 	    consume_timeslice_test(Config);
 2768: 	{false, true} ->
 2769: 	    {skipped, "Lock checking enabled"};
 2770: 	_ ->
 2771: 	    {skipped, "Debug compiled"}
 2772:     end.
 2773: 
 2774: consume_timeslice_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2775:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2776:     CONTEXT_REDS = 4000,
 2777:     Me = self(),
 2778:     Go = make_ref(),
 2779:     RedDiff = make_ref(),
 2780:     Done = make_ref(),
 2781:     DummyMFA = {?MODULE,dummy_call,1},
 2782:     P = spawn(fun () ->
 2783:                       receive Go -> ok end,
 2784:                       {reductions, R1} = process_info(self(), reductions),
 2785:                       1 = consume_timeslice_nif(100, false),
 2786:                       dummy_call(111),
 2787:                       0 = consume_timeslice_nif(90, false),
 2788:                       dummy_call(222),
 2789:                       1 = consume_timeslice_nif(10, false),
 2790:                       dummy_call(333),
 2791:                       0 = consume_timeslice_nif(25, false),
 2792:                       0 = consume_timeslice_nif(25, false),
 2793:                       0 = consume_timeslice_nif(25, false),
 2794:                       1 = consume_timeslice_nif(25, false),
 2795:                       0 = consume_timeslice_nif(25, false),
 2796: 
 2797:                       ok = case consume_timeslice_nif(1, true) of
 2798:                                Cnt when Cnt > 70, Cnt < 80 -> ok;
 2799:                                Other -> Other
 2800:                            end,
 2801:                       dummy_call(444),
 2802: 
 2803:                       {reductions, R2} = process_info(self(), reductions),
 2804:                       Me ! {RedDiff, R2 - R1},
 2805:                       exit(Done)
 2806:               end),
 2807:     erlang:yield(),
 2808: 
 2809:     erlang:trace_pattern(DummyMFA, [{'_', [], [{return_trace}]}], [local]),
 2810:     1 = erlang:trace(P, true, [call, running, procs, {tracer, self()}]),
 2811: 
 2812:     P ! Go,
 2813: 
 2814:     %% receive Go -> ok end,
 2815:     {trace, P, in, _} = next_tmsg(P),
 2816: 
 2817:     %% consume_timeslice_nif(100),
 2818:     %% dummy_call(111)
 2819:     %%
 2820:     %% Note that we may be scheduled out immediately before or immediately
 2821:     %% "after" dummy_call(111) depending on when the emulator tests reductions.
 2822:     %%
 2823:     %% In either case, we should be rescheduled before the function returns.
 2824:     Dummy_111 = {?MODULE,dummy_call,[111]},
 2825:     case next_tmsg(P) of
 2826:         {trace, P, out, _} ->
 2827:             %% See dummy_call(111) above
 2828:             {trace, P, in, _} = next_tmsg(P),
 2829:             {trace, P, call, Dummy_111} = next_tmsg(P);
 2830:         {trace, P, call, Dummy_111} ->
 2831:             {trace, P, out, _} = next_tmsg(P),
 2832:             {trace, P, in, _} = next_tmsg(P)
 2833:     end,
 2834:     {trace, P, return_from, DummyMFA, ok} = next_tmsg(P),
 2835: 
 2836:     %% consume_timeslice_nif(90),
 2837:     %% dummy_call(222)
 2838:     Dummy_222 = {?MODULE,dummy_call,[222]},
 2839:     {trace, P, call, Dummy_222} = next_tmsg(P),
 2840:     {trace, P, return_from, DummyMFA, ok} = next_tmsg(P),
 2841: 
 2842:     %% consume_timeslice_nif(10),
 2843:     %% dummy_call(333)
 2844:     Dummy_333 = {?MODULE,dummy_call,[333]},
 2845:     case next_tmsg(P) of
 2846:         {trace, P, out, _} ->
 2847:             %% See dummy_call(111) above
 2848:             {trace, P, in, _} = next_tmsg(P),
 2849:             {trace, P, call, Dummy_333} = next_tmsg(P);
 2850:         {trace, P, call, Dummy_333} ->
 2851:             {trace, P, out, _} = next_tmsg(P),
 2852:             {trace, P, in, _} = next_tmsg(P)
 2853:     end,
 2854:     {trace, P, return_from, DummyMFA, ok} = next_tmsg(P),
 2855: 
 2856:     %% 25,25,25,25, 25
 2857:     {trace, P, out, {?MODULE,consume_timeslice_nif,2}} = next_tmsg(P),
 2858:     {trace, P, in, {?MODULE,consume_timeslice_nif,2}} = next_tmsg(P),
 2859: 
 2860:     %% consume_timeslice(1,true)
 2861:     %% dummy_call(444)
 2862:     Dummy_444 = {?MODULE,dummy_call,[444]},
 2863:     case next_tmsg(P) of
 2864:         {trace, P, out, DummyMFA} ->
 2865:             %% See dummy_call(111) above
 2866:             {trace, P, in, DummyMFA} = next_tmsg(P),
 2867:             {trace, P, call, Dummy_444} = next_tmsg(P);
 2868:         {trace, P, call, Dummy_444} ->
 2869:             {trace, P, out, DummyMFA} = next_tmsg(P),
 2870:             {trace, P, in, DummyMFA} = next_tmsg(P)
 2871:     end,
 2872:     {trace, P, return_from, DummyMFA, ok} = next_tmsg(P),
 2873: 
 2874:     %% exit(Done)
 2875:     {trace, P, exit, Done} = next_tmsg(P),
 2876: 
 2877:     ExpReds = (100 + 90 + 10 + 25*5 + 75) * CONTEXT_REDS div 100,
 2878:     receive
 2879: 	{RedDiff, Reductions} when Reductions < (ExpReds + 10), Reductions > (ExpReds - 10) ->
 2880: 	    io:format("Reductions = ~p~n", [Reductions]),
 2881: 	    ok;
 2882: 	{RedDiff, Reductions} ->
 2883: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_reduction_count, Reductions, ExpReds})
 2884:     end,
 2885:     
 2886:     none = next_msg(P),
 2887: 
 2888:     ok.
 2889: 
 2890: nif_schedule(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2891:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2892:     A = "this is a string",
 2893:     B = {this,is,a,tuple},
 2894:     {B,A} = call_nif_schedule(A, B),
 2895:     ok = try call_nif_schedule(1, 2)
 2896: 	 catch
 2897: 	     error:badarg:Stk ->
 2898: 		 [{?MODULE,call_nif_schedule,[1,2],_}|_] = Stk,
 2899: 		 ok
 2900: 	 end,
 2901:     ok.
 2902: 
 2903: nif_exception(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2904:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2905:     try
 2906: 	%% this checks that the expected exception occurs when the NIF
 2907: 	%% calls enif_make_badarg at some point but then tries to return a
 2908: 	%% value that isn't an exception
 2909: 	call_nif_exception(0),
 2910: 	ct:fail(expected_badarg)
 2911:     catch
 2912: 	error:badarg ->
 2913: 	    ok
 2914:     end,
 2915:     %% this checks that a NIF can raise various terms as exceptions
 2916:     ok = nif_raise_exceptions(call_nif_exception),
 2917:     ok.
 2918: 
 2919: nif_nan_and_inf(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2920:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2921:     try
 2922: 	call_nif_nan_or_inf(nan),
 2923: 	ct:fail(expected_badarg)
 2924:     catch
 2925: 	error:badarg ->
 2926: 	    ok
 2927:     end,
 2928:     try
 2929: 	call_nif_nan_or_inf(inf),
 2930: 	ct:fail(expected_badarg)
 2931:     catch
 2932: 	error:badarg ->
 2933: 	    ok
 2934:     end,
 2935:     try
 2936: 	call_nif_nan_or_inf(tuple),
 2937: 	ct:fail(expected_badarg)
 2938:     catch
 2939: 	error:badarg ->
 2940: 	    ok
 2941:     end.
 2942: 
 2943: nif_atom_too_long(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2944:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 2945:     try
 2946: 	call_nif_atom_too_long(all),
 2947: 	ct:fail(expected_badarg)
 2948:     catch
 2949: 	error:badarg ->
 2950: 	    ok
 2951:     end,
 2952:     try
 2953: 	call_nif_atom_too_long(len),
 2954: 	ct:fail(expected_badarg)
 2955:     catch
 2956: 	error:badarg ->
 2957: 	    ok
 2958:     end.
 2959: 
 2960: next_msg(_Pid) ->
 2961:     receive
 2962:         M -> M
 2963:     after 100 ->
 2964:               none
 2965:     end.
 2966: 
 2967: next_tmsg(Pid) ->    
 2968:     receive TMsg when is_tuple(TMsg),
 2969:                       element(1, TMsg) == trace,
 2970:                       element(2, TMsg) == Pid ->
 2971:                 TMsg
 2972:     after 100 ->
 2973:               none
 2974:     end.
 2975: 
 2976: dummy_call(_) ->    
 2977:     ok.
 2978: 
 2979: tmpmem() ->
 2980:     erts_debug:alloc_blocks_size(temp_alloc).
 2981: 
 2982: verify_tmpmem(MemInfo) ->
 2983:     %%wait_for_test_procs(),
 2984:     case tmpmem() of
 2985: 	MemInfo ->
 2986: 	    io:format("Tmp mem info: ~p", [MemInfo]),
 2987: 	    case MemInfo of
 2988: 		{notsup,undefined} ->
 2989: 		    %% Use 'erl +Mea max' to do more complete memory leak testing.
 2990: 		    {comment,"Incomplete or no mem leak testing"};
 2991: 		_ ->
 2992: 		    ok
 2993: 	    end;
 2994: 	Other ->
 2995:             ct:fail("Expected: ~p\nActual:   ~p", [MemInfo, Other])
 2996:     end.
 2997: 
 2998: call(Pid,Cmd) ->
 2999:     %%io:format("~p calling ~p with ~p\n",[self(), Pid, Cmd]),
 3000:     Pid ! {self(), Cmd},
 3001:     receive
 3002: 	{Pid,Reply} -> Reply
 3003:     end.
 3004: 
 3005: receive_any() ->
 3006:     receive M -> M end.	     
 3007: 
 3008: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 3009:     receive M -> M
 3010:     after Timeout -> timeout end.
 3011: 
 3012: flush() ->
 3013:     flush(1).
 3014: 
 3015: flush(0) ->
 3016:     flush(0, 10);  % don't waste too much time waiting for nothing
 3017: flush(N) ->
 3018:     flush(N, 1000).
 3019: 
 3020: flush(N, Timeout) ->
 3021:     receive M ->
 3022:             [M | flush(N-1)]
 3023:     after Timeout ->
 3024:             []
 3025:     end.
 3026: 
 3027: repeat(0, _, Arg) ->
 3028:     Arg;
 3029: repeat(N, Fun, Arg0) ->
 3030:     repeat(N-1, Fun, Fun(Arg0)).
 3031: 
 3032: repeat_while(Fun, Acc0) ->
 3033:     case Fun(Acc0) of
 3034:         false -> ok;
 3035:         Acc1 ->
 3036:             repeat_while(Fun, Acc1)
 3037:     end.
 3038: 
 3039: check(Exp,Got,Line) ->
 3040:     case Got of
 3041:  	Exp -> Exp;	    
 3042:   	_ ->
 3043: 	    io:format("CHECK at line ~p\nExpected: ~p\nGot     : ~p\n",
 3044:                       [Line,Exp,Got]),
 3045:  	    Got
 3046:     end.
 3047: 
 3048: nif_raise_exceptions(NifFunc) ->
 3049:     ExcTerms = [{error, test}, "a string", <<"a binary">>,
 3050:                 42, [1,2,3,4,5], [{p,1},{p,2},{p,3}]],
 3051:     lists:foldl(fun(Term, ok) ->
 3052:                         try
 3053:                             erlang:apply(?MODULE,NifFunc,[Term]),
 3054:                             ct:fail({expected,Term})
 3055:                         catch
 3056:                             error:Term:Stk ->
 3057:                                 [{?MODULE,NifFunc,[Term],_}|_] = Stk,
 3058:                                 ok
 3059:                         end
 3060:                 end, ok, ExcTerms).
 3061: 
 3062: -define(ERL_NIF_TIME_ERROR, -9223372036854775808).
 3063: -define(TIME_UNITS, [second, millisecond, microsecond, nanosecond]).
 3064: 
 3065: nif_monotonic_time(_Config) ->
 3066:     ?ERL_NIF_TIME_ERROR = monotonic_time(invalid_time_unit),
 3067:     mtime_loop(1000000).
 3068: 
 3069: mtime_loop(0) ->
 3070:     ok;
 3071: mtime_loop(N) ->
 3072:     chk_mtime(?TIME_UNITS),
 3073:     mtime_loop(N-1).
 3074: 
 3075: chk_mtime([]) ->
 3076:     ok;
 3077: chk_mtime([TU|TUs]) ->
 3078:     A = erlang:monotonic_time(TU),
 3079:     B = monotonic_time(TU),
 3080:     C = erlang:monotonic_time(TU),
 3081:     try
 3082: 	true = A =< B,
 3083: 	true = B =< C
 3084:     catch
 3085: 	_ : _ ->
 3086: 	    ct:fail({monotonic_time_missmatch, TU, A, B, C})
 3087:     end,
 3088:     chk_mtime(TUs).
 3089: 
 3090: nif_time_offset(_Config) ->
 3091:     ?ERL_NIF_TIME_ERROR = time_offset(invalid_time_unit),
 3092:     toffs_loop(1000000).
 3093: 
 3094: toffs_loop(0) ->
 3095:     ok;
 3096: toffs_loop(N) ->
 3097:     chk_toffs(?TIME_UNITS),
 3098:     toffs_loop(N-1).
 3099: 
 3100: chk_toffs([]) ->
 3101:     ok;
 3102: chk_toffs([TU|TUs]) ->
 3103:     TO = erlang:time_offset(TU),
 3104:     NifTO = time_offset(TU),
 3105:     case TO =:= NifTO of
 3106:         true ->
 3107:             ok;
 3108:         false ->
 3109:             case erlang:system_info(time_warp_mode) of
 3110:                 no_time_warp ->
 3111:                     ct:fail({time_offset_mismatch, TU, TO, NifTO});
 3112:                 _ ->
 3113:                     %% Most frequent time offset change
 3114:                     %% is currently only every 15:th
 3115:                     %% second so this should currently
 3116:                     %% work...
 3117:                     NTO = erlang:time_offset(TU),
 3118:                     case NifTO =:= NTO of
 3119:                         true ->
 3120:                             ok;
 3121:                         false ->
 3122:                             ct:fail({time_offset_mismatch, TU, TO, NifTO, NTO})
 3123:                     end
 3124:             end
 3125:     end,
 3126:     chk_toffs(TUs).
 3127: 
 3128: nif_convert_time_unit(_Config) ->
 3129:     ?ERL_NIF_TIME_ERROR = convert_time_unit(0, second, invalid_time_unit),
 3130:     ?ERL_NIF_TIME_ERROR = convert_time_unit(0, invalid_time_unit, second),
 3131:     ?ERL_NIF_TIME_ERROR = convert_time_unit(0, invalid_time_unit, invalid_time_unit),
 3132:     lists:foreach(fun (Offset) ->
 3133:                           lists:foreach(fun (Diff) ->
 3134:                                                 chk_ctu(Diff+(Offset*1000*1000*1000))
 3135:                                         end,
 3136:                                         [999999999999,
 3137:                                          99999999999,
 3138:                                          9999999999,
 3139:                                          999999999,
 3140:                                          99999999,
 3141:                                          9999999,
 3142:                                          999999,
 3143:                                          99999,
 3144:                                          999,
 3145:                                          99,
 3146:                                          9,
 3147:                                          1,
 3148:                                          11,
 3149:                                          101,
 3150:                                          1001,
 3151:                                          10001,
 3152:                                          100001,
 3153:                                          1000001,
 3154:                                          10000001,
 3155:                                          100000001,
 3156:                                          1000000001,
 3157:                                          100000000001,
 3158:                                          1000000000001,
 3159:                                          5,
 3160:                                          50,
 3161:                                          500,
 3162:                                          5000,
 3163:                                          50000,
 3164:                                          500000,
 3165:                                          5000000,
 3166:                                          50000000,
 3167:                                          500000000,
 3168:                                          5000000000,
 3169:                                          50000000000,
 3170:                                          500000000000])
 3171:                   end,
 3172:                   [-4711, -1000, -475, -5, -4, -3, -2, -1, 0,
 3173:                    1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 475, 1000, 4711]),
 3174:     ctu_loop(1000000).
 3175: 
 3176: ctu_loop(0) ->
 3177:     ok;
 3178: ctu_loop(N) ->
 3179:     chk_ctu(erlang:monotonic_time(nanosecond)),
 3180:     ctu_loop(N-1).
 3181: 
 3182: chk_ctu(Time) ->
 3183:     chk_ctu(Time, ?TIME_UNITS).
 3184: 
 3185: chk_ctu(_Time, []) ->
 3186:     ok;
 3187: chk_ctu(Time, [FromTU|FromTUs]) ->
 3188:     chk_ctu(Time, FromTU, ?TIME_UNITS),
 3189:     chk_ctu(Time, FromTUs).
 3190: 
 3191: chk_ctu(_Time, _FromTU, []) ->
 3192:     ok;
 3193: chk_ctu(Time, FromTU, [ToTU|ToTUs]) ->
 3194:     T = erlang:convert_time_unit(Time, nanosecond, FromTU),
 3195:     TE = erlang:convert_time_unit(T, FromTU, ToTU),
 3196:     TN = convert_time_unit(T, FromTU, ToTU),
 3197:     case TE =:= TN of
 3198: 	false ->
 3199: 	    ct:fail({conversion_mismatch, FromTU, T, ToTU, TE, TN});
 3200: 	true ->
 3201: 	    chk_ctu(Time, FromTU, ToTUs)
 3202:     end.
 3203: 
 3204: nif_now_time(Config) ->
 3205:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3206: 
 3207:     N1 = now(),
 3208:     NifN1 = now_time(),
 3209:     NifN2 = now_time(),
 3210:     N2 = now(),
 3211:     true = N1 < NifN1,
 3212:     true = NifN1 < NifN2,
 3213:     true = NifN2 < N2.
 3214: 
 3215: nif_cpu_time(Config) ->
 3216:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3217: 
 3218:     try cpu_time() of
 3219:         {_, _, _} ->
 3220:             ok
 3221:     catch error:badarg ->
 3222:             {comment, "cpu_time not supported"}
 3223:     end.
 3224: 
 3225: nif_unique_integer(Config) ->
 3226:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3227: 
 3228:     UM1 = erlang:unique_integer([monotonic]),
 3229:     UM2 = unique_integer_nif([monotonic]),
 3230:     UM3 = erlang:unique_integer([monotonic]),
 3231: 
 3232:     true = UM1 < UM2,
 3233:     true = UM2 < UM3,
 3234: 
 3235:     UMP1 = erlang:unique_integer([monotonic, positive]),
 3236:     UMP2 = unique_integer_nif([monotonic, positive]),
 3237:     UMP3 = erlang:unique_integer([monotonic, positive]),
 3238: 
 3239:     true = 0 =< UMP1,
 3240:     true = UMP1 < UMP2,
 3241:     true = UMP2 < UMP3,
 3242: 
 3243:     UP1 = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 3244:     UP2 = unique_integer_nif([positive]),
 3245:     UP3 = erlang:unique_integer([positive]),
 3246: 
 3247:     true = 0 =< UP1,
 3248:     true = 0 =< UP2,
 3249:     true = 0 =< UP3,
 3250: 
 3251:     true = is_integer(unique_integer_nif([])),
 3252:     true = is_integer(unique_integer_nif([])),
 3253:     true = is_integer(unique_integer_nif([])).
 3254: 
 3255: nif_is_process_alive(Config) ->
 3256:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3257: 
 3258:     {Pid,_} = spawn_monitor(fun() -> receive ok -> nok end end),
 3259:     true = is_process_alive_nif(Pid),
 3260:     exit(Pid, die),
 3261:     receive _ -> ok end, %% Clear monitor
 3262:     false = is_process_alive_nif(Pid).
 3263: 
 3264: nif_is_port_alive(Config) ->
 3265:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3266: 
 3267:     Port = open_port({spawn,echo_drv},[eof]),
 3268:     true = is_port_alive_nif(Port),
 3269:     port_close(Port),
 3270:     false = is_port_alive_nif(Port).
 3271: 
 3272: nif_term_to_binary(Config) ->
 3273:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3274:     T = {#{ok => nok}, <<0:8096>>, lists:seq(1,100)},
 3275:     Bin = term_to_binary(T),
 3276:     ct:log("~p",[Bin]),
 3277:     Bin = term_to_binary_nif(T, undefined),
 3278:     true = term_to_binary_nif(T, self()),
 3279:     receive Bin -> ok end.
 3280: 
 3281: -define(ERL_NIF_BIN2TERM_SAFE, 16#20000000).
 3282: 
 3283: nif_binary_to_term(Config) ->
 3284:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3285:     BigMap = maps:from_list([{I,-I} || I <- lists:seq(1,100)]),
 3286:     [nif_binary_to_term_do(T)
 3287:      || T <- [{#{ok => nok}, <<0:8096>>, lists:seq(1,100)},
 3288:               atom, 42, self(), BigMap]],
 3289:     ok.
 3290: 
 3291: nif_binary_to_term_do(T) ->
 3292:     Dummy = [true|false],
 3293:     Bin = term_to_binary(T),
 3294:     Len = byte_size(Bin),
 3295:     {Len,T,Dummy} = binary_to_term_nif(Bin, undefined, 0),
 3296:     Len = binary_to_term_nif(Bin, self(), 0),
 3297:     {T,Dummy} = receive M -> M after 1000 -> timeout end,
 3298: 
 3299:     {Len,T,Dummy} = binary_to_term_nif(Bin, undefined, ?ERL_NIF_BIN2TERM_SAFE),
 3300:     false = binary_to_term_nif(<<131,100,0,14,"undefined_atom">>,
 3301:                                undefined, ?ERL_NIF_BIN2TERM_SAFE),
 3302:     false = binary_to_term_nif(Bin, undefined, 1),
 3303:     ok.
 3304: 
 3305: nif_port_command(Config) ->
 3306:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3307: 
 3308:     Port = open_port({spawn,echo_drv},[eof]),
 3309:     true = port_command_nif(Port, "hello\n"),
 3310:     receive {Port,{data,"hello\n"}} -> ok
 3311:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(timeout) end,
 3312: 
 3313:     RefcBin = lists:flatten([lists:duplicate(100, "hello"),"\n"]),
 3314:     true = port_command_nif(Port, iolist_to_binary(RefcBin)),
 3315:     receive {Port,{data,RefcBin}} -> ok
 3316:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(timeout) end,
 3317: 
 3318:     %% Test that invalid arguments correctly returns
 3319:     %% badarg and that the port survives.
 3320:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch port_command_nif(Port, [ok])),
 3321: 
 3322:     IoList = [lists:duplicate(100,<<"hello">>),"\n"],
 3323:     true = port_command_nif(Port, [IoList]),
 3324:     FlatIoList = binary_to_list(iolist_to_binary(IoList)),
 3325:     receive {Port,{data,FlatIoList}} -> ok
 3326:     after 1000 -> ct:fail(timeout) end,
 3327: 
 3328:     port_close(Port),
 3329: 
 3330:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch port_command_nif(Port, "hello\n")),
 3331:     ok.
 3332: 
 3333: nif_snprintf(Config) ->
 3334:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3335:     <<"ok",0>> = format_term_nif(3,ok),
 3336:     <<"o",0>>  = format_term_nif(2,ok),
 3337:     <<"\"hello world\"",0>> = format_term_nif(14,"hello world"),
 3338:     <<"{{hello,world,-33},3.14",_/binary>> = format_term_nif(50,{{hello,world, -33}, 3.14, self()}),
 3339:     <<"{{hello,world,-33},",0>> = format_term_nif(20,{{hello,world, -33}, 3.14, self()}),
 3340:     ok.
 3341: 
 3342: nif_internal_hash(Config) ->
 3343:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3344:     HashValueBitSize = nif_hash_result_bitsize(internal),
 3345:     Terms = unique([random_term() || _ <- lists:seq(1, 500)]),
 3346:     HashValues = [hash_nif(internal, Term, 0) || Term <- Terms],
 3347:     test_bit_distribution_fitness(HashValues, HashValueBitSize).
 3348: 
 3349: nif_internal_hash_salted(Config) ->
 3350:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3351:     test_salted_nif_hash(internal).
 3352: 
 3353: nif_phash2(Config) ->
 3354:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3355:     HashValueBitSize = nif_hash_result_bitsize(phash2),
 3356:     Terms = unique([random_term() || _ <- lists:seq(1, 500)]),
 3357:     HashValues =
 3358:         lists:map(
 3359:           fun (Term) ->
 3360:                   HashValue = erlang:phash2(Term),
 3361:                   Salt = random_uint32(), % phash2 should ignore salt
 3362:                   NifHashValue = hash_nif(phash2, Term, Salt),
 3363:                   (HashValue =:= NifHashValue
 3364:                    orelse ct:fail("Expected: ~p\nActual:   ~p",
 3365:                                   [HashValue, NifHashValue])),
 3366:                   HashValue
 3367:           end,
 3368:           Terms),
 3369:     test_bit_distribution_fitness(HashValues, HashValueBitSize).
 3370: 
 3371: test_salted_nif_hash(HashType) ->
 3372:     HashValueBitSize = nif_hash_result_bitsize(HashType),
 3373:     Terms = unique([random_term() || _ <- lists:seq(1, 500)]),
 3374:     Salts = unique([random_uint32() || _ <- lists:seq(1, 50)]),
 3375:     {HashValuesPerSalt, HashValuesPerTerm} =
 3376:         lists:mapfoldl(
 3377:           fun (Salt, Acc) ->
 3378:                   {HashValues, NewAcc} =
 3379:                     lists:mapfoldl(
 3380:                       fun (Term, AccB) ->
 3381:                               HashValue = hash_nif(HashType, Term, Salt),
 3382:                               NewAccB = dict:append(Term, HashValue, AccB),
 3383:                               {HashValue, NewAccB}
 3384:                       end,
 3385:                       Acc,
 3386:                       Terms),
 3387:                   {{Salt, HashValues}, NewAcc}
 3388:           end,
 3389:           dict:new(),
 3390:           Salts),
 3391: 
 3392:     % Test per-salt hash distribution of different terms
 3393:     lists:foreach(
 3394:       fun ({_Salt, HashValues}) ->
 3395:               test_bit_distribution_fitness(HashValues, HashValueBitSize)
 3396:       end,
 3397:       HashValuesPerSalt),
 3398: 
 3399:     % Test per-term hash distribution of different salts
 3400:     dict:fold(
 3401:       fun (_Term, HashValues, Acc) ->
 3402:               test_bit_distribution_fitness(HashValues, HashValueBitSize),
 3403:               Acc
 3404:       end,
 3405:       ok,
 3406:       HashValuesPerTerm).
 3407: 
 3408: test_bit_distribution_fitness(Integers, BitSize) ->
 3409:     MaxInteger = (1 bsl BitSize) - 1,
 3410:     OnesPerBit =
 3411:         lists:foldl(
 3412:           fun (Integer, Acc) when Integer >= 0, Integer =< MaxInteger ->
 3413:                   lists:foldl(
 3414:                     fun (BitIndex, AccB) ->
 3415:                             BitValue = (Integer band (1 bsl BitIndex)) bsr BitIndex,
 3416:                             orddict:update_counter(BitIndex, BitValue, AccB)
 3417:                     end,
 3418:                     Acc,
 3419:                     lists:seq(0, BitSize - 1))
 3420:           end,
 3421:           orddict:new(),
 3422:           Integers),
 3423: 
 3424:     N = length(Integers),
 3425:     ExpectedNrOfOnes = N div 2,
 3426:     %% ExpectedNrOfOnes should have a binomial distribution
 3427:     %% with a standard deviation as:
 3428:     ExpectedStdDev = math:sqrt(N) / 2,
 3429:     %% which can be approximated as a normal distribution
 3430:     %% where we allow a deviation of 6 std.devs
 3431:     %% for a fail probability of 0.000000002:
 3432:     MaxStdDevs = 6,
 3433: 
 3434:     FailureText =
 3435:         orddict:fold(
 3436:           fun (BitIndex, NrOfOnes, Acc) ->
 3437:                   Deviation = abs(NrOfOnes - ExpectedNrOfOnes) / ExpectedStdDev,
 3438:                   case Deviation >= MaxStdDevs of
 3439:                       false ->
 3440:                           Acc;
 3441:                       true ->
 3442:                           [Acc,
 3443:                            io_lib:format(
 3444:                              "Unreasonable deviation on number of set bits (i=~p): "
 3445:                              "expected ~p, got ~p (# std.dev ~.3f > ~p)~n",
 3446:                              [BitIndex, ExpectedNrOfOnes, NrOfOnes, Deviation, MaxStdDevs])]
 3447:                   end
 3448:           end,
 3449:           [],
 3450:           OnesPerBit),
 3451: 
 3452:     (FailureText =:= [] orelse ct:fail(FailureText)).
 3453: 
 3454: nif_hash_result_bitsize(internal) -> 32;
 3455: nif_hash_result_bitsize(phash2) -> 27.
 3456: 
 3457: unique(List) ->
 3458:     lists:usort(List).
 3459: 
 3460: random_uint32() ->
 3461:     rand:uniform(1 bsl 32) - 1.
 3462: 
 3463: random_term() ->
 3464:     case rand:uniform(6) of
 3465:         1 -> rand:uniform(1 bsl 27) - 1; % small
 3466:         2 -> (1 bsl 27) + rand:uniform(1 bsl 128); % big
 3467:         3 -> random_sign() * (rand:uniform() * (1 bsl 53)); % float
 3468:         4 -> random_binary();
 3469:         5 -> random_pid();
 3470:         6 ->
 3471:             Length = rand:uniform(10),
 3472:             List = [random_term() || _ <- lists:seq(1, Length)],
 3473:             case rand:uniform(2) of
 3474:                 1 ->
 3475:                    List;
 3476:                 2 ->
 3477:                    list_to_tuple(List)
 3478:             end
 3479:     end.
 3480: 
 3481: random_sign() ->
 3482:     case rand:uniform(2) of
 3483:         1 -> -1.0;
 3484:         2 -> 1.0
 3485:     end.
 3486: 
 3487: random_binary() ->
 3488:     rand:bytes(rand:uniform(32) - 1).
 3489: 
 3490: random_pid() ->
 3491:     Processes = erlang:processes(),
 3492:     lists:nth(rand:uniform(length(Processes)), Processes).
 3493: 
 3494: %% Test enif_whereis_...
 3495: 
 3496: nif_whereis(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3497:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3498: 
 3499:     RegName = nif_whereis_test_thing,
 3500:     undefined = erlang:whereis(RegName),
 3501:     false = whereis_term(pid, RegName),
 3502: 
 3503:     Mgr = self(),
 3504:     Ref = make_ref(),
 3505:     ProcMsg = {Ref, ?LINE},
 3506:     PortMsg = ?MODULE_STRING " whereis hello\n",
 3507: 
 3508:     {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(?MODULE, nif_whereis_proxy, [Ref]),
 3509:     true = register(RegName, Pid),
 3510:     Pid = erlang:whereis(RegName),
 3511:     Pid = whereis_term(pid, RegName),
 3512:     false = whereis_term(port, RegName),
 3513:     false = whereis_term(pid, [RegName]),
 3514: 
 3515:     ok = whereis_send(pid, RegName, {forward, Mgr, ProcMsg}),
 3516:     ok = receive ProcMsg -> ok end,
 3517: 
 3518:     Pid ! {Ref, quit},
 3519:     ok = receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, normal} -> ok end,
 3520:     undefined = erlang:whereis(RegName),
 3521:     false = whereis_term(pid, RegName),
 3522: 
 3523:     Port = open_port({spawn, echo_drv}, [eof]),
 3524:     true = register(RegName, Port),
 3525:     Port = erlang:whereis(RegName),
 3526:     Port = whereis_term(port, RegName),
 3527:     false = whereis_term(pid, RegName),
 3528:     false = whereis_term(port, [RegName]),
 3529: 
 3530:     ok = whereis_send(port, RegName, PortMsg),
 3531:     ok = receive {Port, {data, PortMsg}} -> ok end,
 3532: 
 3533:     port_close(Port),
 3534:     undefined = erlang:whereis(RegName),
 3535:     false = whereis_term(port, RegName),
 3536:     ok.
 3537: 
 3538: nif_whereis_parallel(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3539:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3540: 
 3541:     %% try to be at least a little asymmetric
 3542:     NProcs = trunc(3.7 * erlang:system_info(schedulers)),
 3543:     NSeq = lists:seq(1, NProcs),
 3544:     Names = [list_to_atom("nif_whereis_proc_" ++ integer_to_list(N))
 3545:             || N <- NSeq],
 3546:     Mgr = self(),
 3547:     Ref = make_ref(),
 3548: 
 3549:     NotReg = fun(Name) ->
 3550:         erlang:whereis(Name) == undefined
 3551:     end,
 3552:     PidReg = fun({Name, Pid, _Mon}) ->
 3553:         erlang:whereis(Name) == Pid andalso whereis_term(pid, Name) == Pid
 3554:     end,
 3555:     RecvDown = fun({_Name, Pid, Mon}) ->
 3556:         receive {'DOWN', Mon, process, Pid, normal} -> true
 3557:         after   1500 -> false end
 3558:     end,
 3559:     RecvNum = fun(N) ->
 3560:         receive {N, Ref} -> true
 3561:         after   1500 -> false end
 3562:     end,
 3563: 
 3564:     true = lists:all(NotReg, Names),
 3565: 
 3566:     %% {Name, Pid, Mon}
 3567:     Procs = lists:map(
 3568:         fun(N) ->
 3569:             Name = lists:nth(N, Names),
 3570:             Prev = lists:nth((if N == 1 -> NProcs; true -> (N - 1) end), Names),
 3571:             Next = lists:nth((if N == NProcs -> 1; true -> (N + 1) end), Names),
 3572:             {Pid, Mon} = spawn_monitor(
 3573:                 ?MODULE, nif_whereis_proxy, [{N, Ref, Mgr, [Prev, Next]}]),
 3574:             true = register(Name, Pid),
 3575:             {Name, Pid, Mon}
 3576:         end, NSeq),
 3577: 
 3578:     true = lists:all(PidReg, Procs),
 3579: 
 3580:     %% tell them all to 'fire' as fast as we can
 3581:     repeat(10, fun(_) ->
 3582:                        [P ! {Ref, send_proc} || {_, P, _} <- Procs]
 3583:                end, void),
 3584: 
 3585:     %% each gets forwarded through two processes
 3586:     repeat(10, fun(_) ->
 3587:                        true = lists:all(RecvNum, NSeq),
 3588:                        true = lists:all(RecvNum, NSeq)
 3589:                end, void),
 3590: 
 3591:     %% tell them all to 'quit' by name
 3592:     [N ! {Ref, quit} || {N, _, _} <- Procs],
 3593:     true = lists:all(RecvDown, Procs),
 3594:     true = lists:all(NotReg, Names),
 3595:     ok.
 3596: 
 3597: nif_whereis_threaded(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 3598:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3599: 
 3600:     RegName = nif_whereis_test_threaded,
 3601:     undefined = erlang:whereis(RegName),
 3602: 
 3603:     Self = self(),
 3604:     true = register(RegName, Self),
 3605: 
 3606:     {ok, ProcThr} = whereis_thd_lookup(pid, RegName, "dtor to proc"),
 3607:     {ok, Self} = whereis_thd_result(ProcThr),
 3608: 
 3609:     nif_whereis_threaded_2(RegName).
 3610: 
 3611: nif_whereis_threaded_2(RegName) ->
 3612:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 3613:     "dtor to proc" = receive_any(1000),
 3614:     true = unregister(RegName),
 3615: 
 3616:     Port = open_port({spawn, echo_drv}, [eof]),
 3617:     true = register(RegName, Port),
 3618: 
 3619:     {ok, PortThr} = whereis_thd_lookup(port, RegName, "dtor to port"),
 3620:     {ok, Port} = whereis_thd_result(PortThr),
 3621: 
 3622:     nif_whereis_threaded_3(Port).
 3623: 
 3624: nif_whereis_threaded_3(Port) ->
 3625:     erlang:garbage_collect(),
 3626:     {Port, {data, "dtor to port"}} = receive_any(1000),
 3627: 
 3628:     port_close(Port),
 3629:     ok.
 3630: 
 3631: %% exported to be spawned by MFA by whereis tests
 3632: nif_whereis_proxy({N, Ref, Mgr, Targets} = Args) ->
 3633:     receive
 3634:         {forward, To, Data} ->
 3635:             To ! Data,
 3636:             nif_whereis_proxy(Args);
 3637:         {Ref, quit} ->
 3638:             ok;
 3639:         {Ref, send_port} ->
 3640:             Msg = ?MODULE_STRING " whereis " ++ integer_to_list(N) ++ "\n",
 3641:             lists:foreach(
 3642:                 fun(T) ->
 3643:                     ok = whereis_send(port, T, Msg)
 3644:                 end, Targets),
 3645:             nif_whereis_proxy(Args);
 3646:         {Ref, send_proc} ->
 3647:             lists:foreach(
 3648:                 fun(T) ->
 3649:                     ok = whereis_send(pid, T, {forward, Mgr, {N, Ref}})
 3650:                 end, Targets),
 3651:             nif_whereis_proxy(Args)
 3652:     end;
 3653: nif_whereis_proxy(Ref) ->
 3654:     receive
 3655:         {forward, To, Data} ->
 3656:             To ! Data,
 3657:             nif_whereis_proxy(Ref);
 3658:         {Ref, quit} ->
 3659:             ok
 3660:     end.
 3661: nif_ioq(Config) ->
 3662:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3663: 
 3664:     Script =
 3665:         [{create, a},
 3666: 
 3667:          %% Test enq of erlang term binary
 3668:          {enqb,   a},
 3669:          {enqb,   a, 3},
 3670: 
 3671:          %% Test enq of non-erlang term binary
 3672:          {enqbraw,a},
 3673:          {enqbraw,a, 5},
 3674:          {peek,   a},
 3675:          {peek_head,  a},
 3676:          {deq,    a, 42},
 3677: 
 3678:          %% Test enqv
 3679:          {enqv,   a, 2, 100},
 3680:          {peek_head,  a},
 3681:          {deq,    a, all},
 3682: 
 3683:          %% This skips all elements but one in the iolist
 3684:          {enqv,   a, 5, iolist_size(nif_ioq_payload(5)) - 1},
 3685:          {peek_head,  a},
 3686:          {peek,   a},
 3687: 
 3688:          %% Ensure that enqueued refc binaries are intact after a roundtrip.
 3689:          %%
 3690:          %% This test and the ones immediately following it does not go through
 3691:          %% erlang:iolist_to_iovec/1
 3692:          {enqv,   a, [nif_ioq_payload(refcbin) || _ <- lists:seq(1,20)], 0},
 3693:          {peek,   a},
 3694: 
 3695:          %% ... heap binaries
 3696:          {enqv,   a, [nif_ioq_payload(heapbin) || _ <- lists:seq(1,20)], 0},
 3697:          {peek,   a},
 3698: 
 3699:          %% ... plain sub-binaries
 3700:          {enqv,   a, [nif_ioq_payload(subbin) || _ <- lists:seq(1,20)], 0},
 3701:          {peek,   a},
 3702: 
 3703:          %% ... unaligned binaries
 3704:          {enqv,   a, [nif_ioq_payload(unaligned_bin) || _ <- lists:seq(1,20)], 0},
 3705:          {peek,   a},
 3706: 
 3707:          %% Enq stuff to destroy with data in queue
 3708:          {enqv,   a, 2, 100},
 3709:          {destroy,a},
 3710: 
 3711:          %% Test destroy of new queue
 3712:          {create, a},
 3713:          {destroy,a}
 3714:         ],
 3715: 
 3716:     nif_ioq_run(Script),
 3717: 
 3718:     %% Test that only enif_inspect_as_vec works
 3719:     Payload = nif_ioq_payload(5),
 3720:     PayloadBin = iolist_to_binary(Payload),
 3721: 
 3722:     [begin
 3723:          PayloadBin = iolist_to_binary(ioq_nif(inspect,Payload,Stack,Env)),
 3724:          <<>>       = iolist_to_binary(ioq_nif(inspect,[],Stack,Env))
 3725:      end || Stack <- [no_stack, use_stack], Env <- [use_env, no_env]],
 3726: 
 3727:     %% Test error cases
 3728: 
 3729:     Q = ioq_nif(create),
 3730: 
 3731:     false = ioq_nif(peek_head, Q),
 3732: 
 3733:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(deq, Q, 1)),
 3734:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(enqv, Q, 1, 1234)),
 3735: 
 3736:     false = ioq_nif(peek_head, Q),
 3737: 
 3738:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(enqv, Q, [atom_in_list], 0)),
 3739:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(enqv, Q, [make_ref()], 0)),
 3740:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(enqv, Q, [256], 0)),
 3741:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(enqv, Q, [-1], 0)),
 3742:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(enqv, Q, [#{}], 0)),
 3743:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(enqv, Q, [1 bsl 64], 0)),
 3744:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(enqv, Q, [{tuple}], 0)),
 3745: 
 3746:     false = ioq_nif(peek_head, Q),
 3747: 
 3748:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(inspect,  [atom_in_list], use_stack)),
 3749:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(inspect,  [make_ref()], no_stack)),
 3750:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(inspect,  [256], use_stack)),
 3751:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(inspect,  [-1], no_stack)),
 3752:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(inspect,  [#{}], use_stack)),
 3753:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(inspect,  [1 bsl 64], no_stack)),
 3754:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(inspect,  [{tuple}], use_stack)),
 3755:     {'EXIT', {badarg, _}} = (catch ioq_nif(inspect,  <<"binary">>, use_stack)),
 3756: 
 3757:     ioq_nif(destroy, Q),
 3758: 
 3759:     %% Test that the example in the docs works
 3760:     ExampleQ = ioq_nif(create),
 3761:     true = ioq_nif(example, ExampleQ, nif_ioq_payload(5)),
 3762:     ioq_nif(destroy, ExampleQ),
 3763: 
 3764:     ok.
 3765: 
 3766: 
 3767: nif_ioq_run(Script) ->
 3768:     nif_ioq_run(Script, #{}).
 3769: 
 3770: nif_ioq_run([{Action, Name}|T], State)
 3771:   when Action =:= enqb; Action =:= enqbraw ->
 3772:     nif_ioq_run([{Action, Name, heapbin}|T], State);
 3773: nif_ioq_run([{Action, Name, Skip}|T], State)
 3774:   when Action =:= enqb, is_integer(Skip);
 3775:        Action =:= enqbraw, is_integer(Skip) ->
 3776:     nif_ioq_run([{Action, Name, heapbin, Skip}|T], State);
 3777: nif_ioq_run([{Action, Name, N}|T], State)
 3778:   when Action =:= enqv; Action =:= enqb; Action =:= enqbraw ->
 3779:     nif_ioq_run([{Action, Name, N, 0}|T], State);
 3780: nif_ioq_run([{Action, Name, N, Skip}|T], State)
 3781:   when Action =:= enqv; Action =:= enqb; Action =:= enqbraw ->
 3782: 
 3783:     #{ q := IOQ, b := B } = Q = maps:get(Name, State),
 3784:     true = ioq_nif(size, IOQ) == iolist_size(B),
 3785: 
 3786:     %% Sanitize the log output a bit so that it doesn't become too large.
 3787:     H = {Action, Name, try iolist_size(N) of Sz -> Sz catch _:_ -> N end, Skip},
 3788:     ct:log("~p", [H]),
 3789: 
 3790:     Data = nif_ioq_payload(N),
 3791:     ioq_nif(Action, IOQ, Data, Skip),
 3792: 
 3793:     <<_:Skip/binary, SkippedData/binary>> = iolist_to_binary(Data),
 3794: 
 3795:     true = ioq_nif(size, IOQ) == (iolist_size([B|SkippedData])),
 3796: 
 3797:     nif_ioq_run(T, State#{ Name := Q#{ b := [B|SkippedData]}});
 3798: nif_ioq_run([{peek, Name} = H|T], State) ->
 3799:     #{ q := IOQ, b := B } = maps:get(Name, State),
 3800:     true = ioq_nif(size, IOQ) == iolist_size(B),
 3801: 
 3802:     ct:log("~p", [H]),
 3803: 
 3804:     Data = ioq_nif(peek, IOQ, ioq_nif(size, IOQ)),
 3805: 
 3806:     true = iolist_to_binary(B) == iolist_to_binary(Data),
 3807:     nif_ioq_run(T, State);
 3808: nif_ioq_run([{peek_head, Name} = H|T], State) ->
 3809:     #{ q := IOQ, b := B } = maps:get(Name, State),
 3810:     RefData = iolist_to_binary(B),
 3811: 
 3812:     ct:log("~p", [H]),
 3813: 
 3814:     {true, QueueHead} = ioq_nif(peek_head, IOQ),
 3815:     true = byte_size(QueueHead) > 0,
 3816: 
 3817:     {RefHead, _Tail} = split_binary(RefData, byte_size(QueueHead)),
 3818: 
 3819:     true = QueueHead =:= RefHead,
 3820: 
 3821:     nif_ioq_run(T, State);
 3822: nif_ioq_run([{deq, Name, all}|T], State) ->
 3823:     #{ q := IOQ, b := B } = maps:get(Name, State),
 3824:     Size = ioq_nif(size, IOQ),
 3825:     true = Size == iolist_size(B),
 3826:     nif_ioq_run([{deq, Name, Size}|T], State);
 3827: nif_ioq_run([{deq, Name, N} = H|T], State) ->
 3828:     #{ q := IOQ, b := B } = Q = maps:get(Name, State),
 3829:     true = ioq_nif(size, IOQ) == iolist_size(B),
 3830: 
 3831:     ct:log("~p", [H]),
 3832: 
 3833:     <<_:N/binary,Remain/binary>> = iolist_to_binary(B),
 3834:     NewQ = Q#{ b := Remain },
 3835: 
 3836:     Sz = ioq_nif(deq, IOQ, N),
 3837: 
 3838:     true = Sz == iolist_size(Remain),
 3839:     true = ioq_nif(size, IOQ) == iolist_size(Remain),
 3840: 
 3841:     nif_ioq_run(T, State#{ Name := NewQ });
 3842: nif_ioq_run([{create, Name} = H|T], State) ->
 3843:     ct:log("~p", [H]),
 3844:     nif_ioq_run(T, State#{ Name => #{ q => ioq_nif(create), b => [] } });
 3845: nif_ioq_run([{destroy, Name} = H|T], State) ->
 3846:     #{ q := IOQ, b := B } = maps:get(Name, State),
 3847:     true = ioq_nif(size, IOQ) == iolist_size(B),
 3848: 
 3849:     ct:log("~p", [H]),
 3850: 
 3851:     ioq_nif(destroy, IOQ),
 3852: 
 3853:     nif_ioq_run(T, maps:remove(Name, State));
 3854: nif_ioq_run([], State) ->
 3855:     State.
 3856: 
 3857: nif_ioq_payload(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 3858:     Tail = if N > 3 -> nif_ioq_payload(N-3); true -> [] end,
 3859:     Head = element(1, lists:split(N,[nif_ioq_payload(subbin),
 3860:                                      nif_ioq_payload(heapbin),
 3861:                                      nif_ioq_payload(refcbin),
 3862:                                      nif_ioq_payload(unaligned_bin) | Tail])),
 3863:     erlang:iolist_to_iovec(Head);
 3864: nif_ioq_payload(subbin) ->
 3865:     Bin = nif_ioq_payload(refcbin),
 3866:     Sz = size(Bin) - 1,
 3867:     <<_:8,SubBin:Sz/binary,_/bits>> = Bin,
 3868:     SubBin;
 3869: nif_ioq_payload(unaligned_bin) ->
 3870:     make_unaligned_binary(<< <<I>> || I <- lists:seq(1, 255) >>);
 3871: nif_ioq_payload(heapbin) ->
 3872:     <<"a literal heap binary">>;
 3873: nif_ioq_payload(refcbin) ->
 3874:     iolist_to_binary([lists:seq(1,255) || _ <- lists:seq(1,255)]);
 3875: nif_ioq_payload(Else) ->
 3876:     Else.
 3877: 
 3878: make_unaligned_binary(Bin0) ->
 3879:     Size = byte_size(Bin0),
 3880:     <<0:3,Bin:Size/binary,31:5>> = id(<<0:3,Bin0/binary,31:5>>),
 3881:     Bin.
 3882: 
 3883: pid(Config) ->
 3884:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3885:     Self = self(),
 3886:     {true, ErlNifPid} = get_local_pid_nif(Self),
 3887:     false = is_pid_undefined_nif(ErlNifPid),
 3888:     Self = make_pid_nif(ErlNifPid),
 3889: 
 3890:     UndefPid = set_pid_undefined_nif(),
 3891:     true = is_pid_undefined_nif(UndefPid),
 3892:     undefined = make_pid_nif(UndefPid),
 3893:     0 = send_term(UndefPid, message),
 3894: 
 3895:     Other = spawn(fun() -> ok end),
 3896:     {true,OtherNifPid} = get_local_pid_nif(Other),
 3897:     Cmp = compare_pids_nif(ErlNifPid, OtherNifPid),
 3898:     true = if Cmp < 0 -> Self < Other;
 3899:               Cmp > 0 -> Self > Other
 3900:            end,
 3901:     0 = compare_pids_nif(ErlNifPid, ErlNifPid),
 3902: 
 3903:     {false, _} = get_local_pid_nif(undefined),
 3904:     ok.
 3905: 
 3906: nif_term_type(Config) ->
 3907:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3908: 
 3909:     atom = term_type_nif(atom),
 3910: 
 3911:     bitstring = term_type_nif(<<1:1>>),
 3912:     bitstring = term_type_nif(<<1:8>>),
 3913: 
 3914:     float = term_type_nif(0.0),
 3915: 
 3916:     'fun' = term_type_nif(fun external:function/1),
 3917:     'fun' = term_type_nif(fun(A) -> A end),
 3918:     'fun' = term_type_nif(fun id/1),
 3919: 
 3920:     integer = term_type_nif(1 bsl 1024),        %Bignum.
 3921:     integer = term_type_nif(1),
 3922: 
 3923:     list = term_type_nif([list]),
 3924:     list = term_type_nif([]),
 3925: 
 3926:     LargeMap = maps:from_list([{N, N} || N <- lists:seq(1, 256)]),
 3927:     map = term_type_nif(LargeMap),
 3928:     map = term_type_nif(#{ small => map }),
 3929: 
 3930:     pid = term_type_nif(self()),
 3931: 
 3932:     Port = open_port({spawn,echo_drv},[eof]),
 3933:     port = term_type_nif(Port),
 3934:     port_close(Port),
 3935: 
 3936:     reference = term_type_nif(make_ref()),
 3937: 
 3938:     tuple = term_type_nif({}),
 3939: 
 3940:     ok.
 3941: 
 3942: %% Verify match state arguments are not passed to declared NIFs.
 3943: match_state_arg(Config) ->
 3944:     ensure_lib_loaded(Config),
 3945:     Bin = term_to_binary([<<"x">> | Config]), % a non-literal binary with an $x byte
 3946:     <<"nif says ok">> = msa_find_x_y(Bin),
 3947:     ok.
 3948: 
 3949: %% Without declaring msa_find_y_nif/1 as NIF, the compiler would do
 3950: %% optimization and pass it a match state as argument.
 3951: msa_find_x_y(<<$x, Rest/binary>>) ->
 3952:     msa_find_y_nif(Rest);
 3953: msa_find_x_y(<<_, Rest/binary>>) ->
 3954:     msa_find_x_y(Rest);
 3955: msa_find_x_y(<<>>) ->
 3956:     "no x".
 3957: 
 3958: msa_find_y_nif(<<$y, Rest/binary>>) ->
 3959:     Rest;
 3960: msa_find_y_nif(<<_, Rest/binary>>) ->
 3961:     msa_find_y_nif(Rest);
 3962: msa_find_y_nif(<<>>) ->
 3963:     "no y".
 3964: 
 3965: 
 3966: last_resource_dtor_call() ->
 3967:     erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, aux_work),
 3968:     last_resource_dtor_call_nif().
 3969: 
 3970: id(I) -> I.
 3971: keep_alive(Term) -> ?MODULE:id(Term).
